definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: Hyperechoic incisor teeth can be seen in the opened mouth.
sentences.chinese: 可以看到張開的口中的強回聲的門齒。

sentences.english: Whales and dolphins rely on their responsive hearing to interpret returning echolocation clicks.
sentences.chinese: 鯨魚和海豚靠回聲定位系統來辨別方向。

sentences.english: When the noise bounces off a fish or a rock, the dolphin hears the echo come back again.
sentences.chinese: 當聲音從魚或岩石反彈回來時，海豚再次聽到回聲。

sentences.english: The echo of the explosion damped itself in the air .
sentences.chinese: 爆炸的回聲還縈迴在空中。

sentences.english: The canyons were alive with gray parrots having a ball. They seemed to love listening to their echoes.
sentences.chinese: 灰鸚鵡歡叫着，自戀地聽着回聲，峽谷一派生意盎然。

sentences.english: On ultrasound, Wilms' appears as a large, heterogeneous mass of the kidney.
sentences.chinese: 表現爲腎臟體積巨大不均質回聲腫物。

sentences.english: The island canyon scenery looks endlessly, the echo ripples between the white clouds.
sentences.chinese: 島峽風光看不盡啦，回聲盪漾白雲間嘍。

sentences.english: Ring the bell of the present, and you will hear the distant echoes of the infinite past and future.
sentences.chinese: 敲響當下的鐘，你會聽到遙遠的過去和未來的回聲。

sentences.english: They talk to each other with echoes of a mandolin or violin.
sentences.chinese: 他們用曼陀林或者小提琴的回聲彼此交談。

sentences.english: The lactiferous ducts was dilated by milk and showed various echo patterns.
sentences.chinese: 乳汁充盈輸乳管回聲多樣。

sentences.english: A portion of the pancreas is shown as an echogenic structure between the stomach and the duodenum.
sentences.chinese: 胰腺的一部分回聲結構顯示在胃和十二指腸之間。

sentences.english: So do you hear the echoes of the ones that'll slowly die?
sentences.chinese: 你聽到那些將死之人的回聲了麼？

sentences.english: Her sweet voice chimed in beautifully with the echo of the music.
sentences.chinese: 她的甜潤的嗓音與樂曲的回聲美妙地融爲一體。

sentences.english: Spherical cystic echoes with fine bright spots in it.
sentences.chinese: 類似球形的囊狀回聲，囊內充滿細小光點。

sentences.english: There is a mixed echogenic mass in the right kidney containing solid and cystic components.
sentences.chinese: 右腎見一混合回聲腫物，含實性和囊性成分。

definition: not a sound to be heard (idiom)
rhyming word ending a line of verse/rhyme
